actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to include Montana among the States which may obtain social security coverage, under State agreement, for State and local policemen as well as firemen.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides, under title II of the Social Security Act (Federal Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance Benefits), for the inclusion of Montana among the States which may obtain social security coverage, under State agreement, for State and local policemen as well as firemen.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to include Montana among the States which may obtain social security coverage, under State agreement, for State and local policemen as well as firemen.
